metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Little Stars has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity and Chord Progression Novelty and below-average scores in Chord-Melody Tension and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Little Stars has sections analyzed in the following keys: G Major,  and F Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
